name: Cup of love (Demo)
description:
"Cup of Love"  takes place years after the cup brothers defeated the devil! the guys are now in their twenties and are called hero's on the island but at times they don't like it but they keep it to them selves, they just wish they could be normal for a while... and in a way they get their wish when they meet you, will love bloom or will you three just be close friends?

Sprites were made by me https://shadegamein.tumblr.com/
the GUI is subject to change

And please if there are any issues please contact me and I will get to you as soon as possible.
